title: old client back!! please
body:
How do i bring back the old client? 

i dont really like the new one,
its way too laggy for me :/ since im playing on a notebook.. 

someone plese halp!!!

replies.body:
Just so you know there is a devblog with more information about the client: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update/article/3a587e99-6c9b-437a-a03b-7a7ac2be4bf8

Provided the link above for you.
click launch, then under the log in information, it says "launch legacy client"
